name: Kokatat Hydrus Stoke Dry Top - Men's
description: This all-around drytop pairs classic features with a modern cut, and keeps water definitively outside where it belongs. The fabric technology uses 3-layer construction that effectively moves water vapour out and stops liquid H2O from getting in.Hydrus 3-layer waterproof-breathable fabric has a soft polyester inner for moisture transport, a polyurethane micro-porous coating, and a rugged nylon outer with a DWR finish.Dual-adjustable outer skirt is made with hook-and-loop-compatible neoprene for a secure seal to sprayskirt tunnels.Inner skirt is breathable Hydrus 2.5-layer fabric.Self-draining zippered chest pocket has a key lanyard.Latex wrist and neck seals are protected by self-draining cuffs and collar made of superstretch neoprene.Factory-sealed seams.
